name: Ban Hammer
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2020 but missed the deadline LOL

Collab with: 

Joshua Liew, Game Designer, 2D artist Discord: @Beastcramps

https://joshualiew.wixsite.com/gamedesignportfolio

-How it fits the theme: You are the only moderator of this streamer and you should do something before the chat goes out of control until the end of the stream.

-How to start the game: Type "ready" into the smaller chat window.

- Banned words: Words you have to ban viewers over. The list of banned words and viewers are in the little chat box.

- Commands: Things you can type into right most chat box to activate /ban or /timeout, put a space and type out name.

- Powers : /slow, slows the chat for a while. Gives you time to scroll the chat box and catch words.

-Subscribers : Stars next to the name. You can't ban them or you get more disorder. --Regular Viewer: You ban them, to not gain disorder

-Time Limit: You have limited time you have to survive. (5 mins)

-Disorder bar: If it fills you lose. Disorder bar fills when you let a banned word scroll out of the chat box. (you can still reach them by scrolling the chat box for a short duration that they still allowed to be caught)
